Lines.Erwin: There is no time! Kiara was taken! We need to prepare now, and go!

Lines.EFAILWENPRIEST: You will be prepared after you are recognized as Men, by the Gods above and your brothers and sister villagers.
The Gods will forgive us this quick ceremony. Come.
I will see you becoming a Man, but none in this village can see you becoming a Warrior, Erwin. Forgive me for this.
